message.body: Hey! Sorry, the family was over. Yeah, I'm full time now. I don't have my own classroom though. I have to go to all the classes (K-4) and teach a math in
tervention program on the computer. The students use school laptops.
Teaching math in the computer seems odd unless you can't do it by hand. Even as someone who does math on a daily basis, I'll do it by hand then put it into code later.
Either way, I hope you enjoy your new job! I know you've been working at it for a while.
Thanks. It's a math computer program, so the concepts are taught through leveled problem-solving games. I basically have to manage the equipment and help
the kids when they need help. I don't actually et to create lessons, which sucks. But hey, it's a job and it will helps get a foot in the door!
